# init(dataSource:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new object using the text selection data source you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init(dataSource: any NSTextSelectionDataSource)
```

## Parameters

- **dataSource**: An `NSTextSelectionDataSource`.
title: init(dataSource:)
